name: Adeus
short_description: ADEUS is tool designed to simplify the preparation of MANET network simulations in the OMNeT++ and MiXiM environment and further analysis of simulation results. Our goal is to minimize hand editing of OMNeT++ configuration files, which is really hard and time consuming task for the average user. ADEUS is used as an interface between the user and MiXiM simulation modules, responsible for setting up the simulation parameters and presenting of simulation results.
summary: ADEUS is graphical add-on for OMNeT++ and MiXiM.
